quote: Nobody is bothered about an institution more than its alumni.
author: N. R. Narayana Murthy

quote: Any institutions' alumni are key to its growth. We are focused on giving a global experience to our students.
author: Shiv Nadar

quote: Without continual growth and progress, such words as improvement, achievement, and success have no meaning.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: There is no man living that can not do more than he thinks he can.
author: Henry Ford

quote: It’s not about time, it’s about choices. How are you spending your choices?
author: Beverly Adamo
